entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whitecourt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:15 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whitecourt Airport 11:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -23.6°C
Pressure: 103.2 kPa
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -26.9°C
Wind: NNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
